testcase.name: Verify get list of user api endpoint
testcase.system-out: When User send get request with 'https://reqres.in/api/users?page=2'........passed Then User verify json path 'page' and value '2' present in the response.....passed

testcase.name: Verify add user to list
testcase.system-out: When User send post request with 'https://reqres.in/api/users' with body '{"name": "morpheus","job": "leader"}'.passed Then User verify json path 'name' and value 'morpheus' present in the response.passed
